questions.question: I .................................... the bell twice.
questions.description: Rang is the simple past of ring.

questions.question: Have you ....................................... the violin?
questions.description: Brought is the simple past of bring.

questions.question: The cat has ....................................... the milk.
questions.description: Drunk is the past participle form of drink.

questions.question: They ...................................... a well in the backyard.
questions.description: Dug is the past simple and past participle of dig.

questions.question: She ...................................... the clothes out.
questions.description: The past simple of wring is wrang or wrung.

questions.question: He has ..................................... a lot on his children's education.
questions.description: Spent is the past simple and past participle form of spend.

questions.question: I have ........................................ to Australia.
questions.description: We use been for finished visit. If somebody has gone to Australia, they are still in Australia.

questions.question: Peter ......................................... under his breath.
questions.description: Sweared is possible in a careless style.

questions.question: They ......................................... the grains into powder.
questions.description: Ground is the past simple of grind.
